Title: Boogie Woogie
Description:
Adds the Boogie Woogie mental mutation from Jujutsu Kaisen!

[h1]Features[/h1]

[b]Boogie Woogie Mental Mutation[/b]
- Clap your hands to instantly swap positions with any target in range
- Can target creatures, objects, or even inanimate items
- Confuses targets on swap (Willpower save to resist)
- Scales with mutation level: increased range, shorter cooldown, higher confusion DC

[b]Vibroslap Cudgels[/b]
- Unique cudgel weapons that grant Boogie Woogie when equipped
- Available in all material tiers: wooden, bronze, iron, steel, carbide, fullerite, folded carbide, zetachrome
- Chance for free action on swap
- Unlocks Boogie Woogie Repeat ability
- Spawns naturally in the world like other cudgels

[b]Boogie Woogie Repeat[/b]
- Requires vibroslap equipped
- Mark multiple targets and shuffle their positions 3-5 times rapidly
- Spectacular mass confusion effect

[b]Vibrating Palm Cybernetics[/b]
- Cybernetic hand implants in all material tiers
- Replaces one hand with a vibrating palm weapon
- Grants permanent Boogie Woogie mutation
- Higher tiers grant stronger mutation levels and better free action chance
- Installs on Hand body slots

[h1]Inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen[/h1]

Boogie Woogie is Todo Aoi's cursed technique from the anime/manga Jujutsu Kaisen. This mod brings the spatial swap mechanic to Caves of Qud!

[h1]Compatibility[/h1]

Should be compatible with most mods. Works great with:
- Mutation mods
- Cybernetics mods
- Weapon collection mods
Tags: Mental Mutations, Gameplay, Items, Cybernetics, Weapons
